meanings.definition: The seven bones in the human ankle joint.
meanings.sent1: My tarsals help me walk and run.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined my tarsals to check for any injuries.
meanings.sent3: The tarsals in my ankle are like a team working together to support me.
meanings.sent4: Her tarsals felt as strong as pillars holding up a building.
meanings.sent5: I could feel every step through my tarsals, grounding me to the earth.

meanings.definition: Relating to or situated near the tarsus of the foot.
meanings.sent1: The tarsals bones provide stability to the ankle.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her tarsals after the long hike.
meanings.sent3: His tarsals socks were mismatched, making him look funny.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved with tarsals grace, gliding across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The shoes were designed to support the tarsals area of the foot for comfort.

meanings.sent1: The injured tarsals required a cast for healing.
meanings.sent2: The tarsals bone was fragile and needed protection.
meanings.sent3: The tiny tarsals bone looked like a miniature version of a puzzle piece.
meanings.sent4: His tarsals bone was as delicate as a butterfly's wing.
meanings.sent5: The tarsals bone played a crucial role in the structure of the foot.
